content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. What is your first offer for the rental price of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in the apartment, but I'd like to propose a fair price. How about 850 Euro per month, including all utilities?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm not interested in fair prices, Emilia. I'm interested in the highest price I can get. I'll counter your offer with 1200 Euro per month, excluding utilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite a difference from my offer. I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment, which includes its location and amenities. Would you be willing to go down to 1050 Euro per month, including utilities?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm not in the business of reflecting values, Emilia. I'm in the business of making money. I'll meet you halfway and revise my offer to 1125 Euro per month, excluding utilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but 1125 Euro is still higher than my initial offer. Could we negotiate a bit more? Perhaps we can find a price that is closer to my initial offer of 850 Euro per month, including utilities.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm not here to play games. I'm here to get the highest price I can for my apartment. I'll revise my offer to 1000 Euro per month, excluding utilities. This is as close to your initial offer as I can get.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. 1000 Euro per month, excluding utilities, is more in line with what I'm looking for. Would it be possible to include at least water in the monthly rent?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not willing to include any utilities in the monthly rent. The price of 1000 Euro per month, excluding utilities, is non-negotiable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since I'm unable to include utilities in the monthly rent, I'll have to reconsider my offer. Can you provide me with some time to think about it?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Sure, Emilia. Take your time. Remember, the offer on the table is 1000 Euro per month, excluding utilities. If you decide to accept this offer, please respond with the sentence, 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the agreed-upon price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll give it some thought and get back to you with my decision.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Emilia. I look forward to your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After careful consideration, I'm ready to proceed with the rental agreement. I agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month, excluding utilities. This price reflects the value of the apartment and its location. I'm looking forward to a long and fruitful relationship with you as my landlord. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
